title: Important Update: ICAI Invites Observations on Jan 2026 CA Exam Question Papers
content:
# Important Update: ICAI Invites Observations on Jan 2026 CA Exam Question Papers

Ek important update hai for all CA students! The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI) ne January 2026 mein conduct kiye gaye CA Final, Intermediate, Foundation, aur Post Qualification Course (INTT-AT & IRM) examinations ke question papers par candidates se observations invite kiye hain.

This is a crucial opportunity for candidates to provide feedback on the exam papers.

*   **Exams Covered:** CA Final, Intermediate, Foundation, and Post Qualification Course â€“ INTT-AT & IRM Examinations held in January 2026.
*   **Purpose:** To bring to the notice of the Examination Department any observations regarding the question papers.
*   **Submission Deadline:** Observations must reach ICAI latest by **January 27, 2026**.
*   **How to Submit:**
    *   Via email at examfeedback\[at]icai\[dot]in.
    *   By sending a letter through Speed Post to: The Joint Secretary (Exams), The Institute of Chartered Accountants of India, ICAI Bhawan, Indraprastha Marg, New Delhi 110 002.
*   **Mandatory Details:** It is critical to include the candidate's Name, Registration number, Roll No., Email-id, and Mobile Number. Observations without these details will not be considered.
